name: Mixed Filler Robusto
additionalNotes: This cigar is made exclusively from Sun Grown Tobacco. It features a complex blend of Short-Mixed filler tobaccos: Nicaraguan Jalapa, Costa Rican and Honduras mixed filler tobaccos. The wrapper and binder are of Sumatra seed origin. A Medium-Light body Blend cigar that produces taste and aroma characteristics similar to the famous Cuban short filler cigars.
